body: Stealth Money is a platform that simplifies buying and saving Bitcoin directly into your self custody, hardware wallets.
Self-custody is a means of holding your Bitcoin in a self-custodial or hardware wallet by which only you have access to your Bitcoin.
Dollar-cost averaging (DCA) is where you buy a fixed amount of BTC at regular intervals (weekly/monthly), no matter the price.

Header: Can someone purchase Bitcoin on my behalf?
body: Yes, using our Gift Bitcoin feature, your loved ones can buy Bitcoin directly into your hardware wallet address.

Header: Where is my Bitcoin purchased going to?
body: Bitcoin gifted to you is sent directly into your hardware wallet address which you provide to the sender.
A hardware wallet, also known as a cold wallet, is a physical device created solely for offline storage of cryptocurrency private keys.
